title: Hero MotoCorp commences operations in Philippines
description: Hero MotoCorp has started operations in the Philippines through a partnership with Terrafirma Motors Corporation. The new facility in Laguna spans over 6,000 square meters and has a capacity of more than 150,000 units annually. The products to be assembled include Xpulse 200 4V, Hunk 160R 4V, and Xoom 110 scooter.
